about_the_game:
Dragons Brew is a captivating boardgame cafe simulation game where you can create and manage your very own cozy cafe. Drawing inspiration from beloved games like Stardew Valley and Traveller’s Rest, Dragons Brew combines charming pixel art with engaging simulation mechanics.

In Dragons Brew, you’ll experience the thrill of running a cafe with a unique twist: offering takeaway services, door deliveries, and an innovative boardgame system that impacts both the cafe operations and the overall gameplay!

Variety of Recipes: Serve Delicious Meals and Drinks


In Dragons Brew, you’ll have access to a wide range of recipes to create delightful meals and beverages for your customers. From classic coffee and tea to exotic pastries and gourmet dishes, each recipe will have unique ingredients and preparation methods. Master the art of cooking and brewing to keep your customers happy and coming back for more.

Expand Your Boardgame Collection: Unlock New Boardgames with Unique Effects


As you progress in Dragons Brew, you’ll unlock an extensive collection of boardgames, each offering unique gameplay mechanics and effects on your cafe. Whether it’s increasing customer satisfaction, boosting your cafe’s popularity, or providing special bonuses, every boardgame will add a new layer of strategy and fun to your cafe management experience.

Quest System: Engage with the Community Through Diverse Quests


Engage with the lively community in Dragons Brew by completing a variety of quests. From helping locals with their requests to organizing special events in your cafe, these quests will offer rewards and unlock new content. Build relationships with the townsfolk, gain their trust, and enhance your cafe’s reputation through meaningful interactions and quests.

Day-Night Cycle and Seasons: Dynamic Changes Affecting Gameplay and Strategy


Experience the passage of time with a realistic day-night cycle and changing seasons in Dragons Brew. Each time of day and season will bring different challenges and opportunities, affecting customer preferences, ingredient availability, and event possibilities. Adapt your strategies to thrive in every situation and make the most of each moment.

Beautiful Pixel Art World: Explore a Vibrant and Detailed World


Immerse yourself in the stunning pixel art world of Dragons Brew. Every detail, from the quaint seaside village to the cozy interiors of your cafe, is meticulously crafted to create a visually enchanting experience. Explore the charming town, interact with its quirky inhabitants, and uncover hidden secrets as you expand your cafe empire.

Character Customization: Personalize Your Avatar


Express your unique style in Dragons Brew by customizing your avatar. Choose from a variety of hairstyles, outfits, and accessories to create a character that reflects your personality. As you progress, unlock more customization options to keep your avatar fresh and fashionable.

Cafe Customization and Expansion: Decorate and Grow Your Cafe


Transform your cafe into the ultimate boardgame hub with extensive customization and expansion options in Dragons Brew. Decorate your cafe with a wide range of furniture, decor, and thematic elements. Expand your space through the local estate agent to accommodate more customers, add new features, and enhance the overall ambiance to attract a diverse clientele.

Farming: Cultivate Ingredients for Your Recipes


In Dragons Brew, you can grow your own ingredients to use in your recipes. Cultivate a variety of crops, from herbs and vegetables to rare and magical plants. Harvest your produce and ensure a steady supply of fresh ingredients.

More Areas: Discover New Locations


Expand your horizons in Dragons Brew by discovering new areas beyond your cafe. Explore neighbouring towns, enchanting forests, retail parks, coffee roasteries and boardgame conventions. Each new location will offer unique challenges, ingredients, and opportunities for your cafe. Uncover the secrets of these areas and integrate their unique elements into your cafe’s offerings.

The world of Dragons Brew is ever-growing, with new boardgames and recipes continuously being added. Stay updated with regular content updates that introduce new boardgames with exciting mechanics and fresh recipes to keep your menu dynamic. Your cafe will always have something new to offer, ensuring endless fun and engagement for you and your customers.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6400 or AMD Phenom X2 Dual-Core GP-7730
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon R7 240
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
